name: Elite Aviation
about: Elite Aviation, located at the Spirit of St. Louis Airport, is a family-owned business specializing in flight training, aircraft maintenance, and more. We prioritize a superior standard of service, offering outstanding instructors and excellently maintained airplanes. Our training includes the use of the Redbird Full-Motion flight simulator and a fleet of meticulously maintained Cessna 172s with high-tech G1000 Glass Cockpits. We provide a comprehensive Test Flight Program and ensure safety is our primary focus. With full insurance and a commitment to excellence, we are the safest decision for your aviation needs. Your safety is our focus, and we are dedicated to providing an exceptional flying experience.
